tests.report: - The website can be more accessible, but is rather good!
tests.report_a11y:
- Number of types of issues: 1 ( 4.80 rating )
- Number of issues: 5 ( 4.50 rating )

##### Problems:
- Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.8/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI)

data.message: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color (https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.8/link-in-text-block?application=axeAPI)
data.selector: html > body > div > section > main > article:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1)

runnerExtras.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
runnerExtras.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
